title: Undefeated
description: 2014 Readers' Favorite award winner Bryant: Smith Brothers fight club has trained some of the world’s leadingMMA fighters, but when the club’s reputation is threatened owner Bryant Smithturns to sexy private detective Parker Wilson to uncover the truth.Ace: Ace Sparks has spent his life trying to make a name for himself in theworld of MMA, but when he comes to the aid of a friend he learns the mostimportant fights are fought outside the ring.Walt: When Walt returns home from war achanged man he must convince the woman he loves that he’s worth a second chance.Paul: For the past four years Paul has been haunted by the death of his wife, but whenhe has his own brush with death he’ll discover his life is indeed worth fightingfor. "The men are a little broken and the women are strong-willed. The characters complemented each other, making perfect pairings."  --  Lorena Sanqui for Readers' Favorite
author: Charity Parkerson
